GSD.description:
nbd: fix io hung while disconnecting device

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit f72df77600a43e59b3189e53b47f8685739867d3. For more details please see the references link.
